lead_paragraph: Patrick Bateman, a Wall Street executive in the 1980s, spends his days making a fortune on Wall Street and his evenings brutally torturing and killing all those who cross him, be it acquaintances or panhandlers on the street.
snippet: Patrick Bateman, a Wall Street executive in the 1980s, spends his days making a fortune on Wall Street and his evenings brutally torturing and killing all those who cross him, be it acquaintances or panhandlers on the street.
